blogPost.excerpt: Habio allows you to dive into the very nature of your habits through psychological exercises, CBT-based reflection journal and timely reminders adjusting to lifestyle goals. Habio is a perfect tool to help you improve your daily routines step by step.
blogPost.body: Habio allows you to dive into the very nature of your habits through psychological exercises, CBT-based reflection journal and timely reminders adjusting to lifestyle goals. Habio is a perfect tool to help you improve your daily routines step by step.
blogPost.title: Habio - Your habit assistant to build new habits & change life
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Habio让你通过心理练习、基于CBT的反思日记和及时提醒调整生活方式目标，深入了解自己习惯的本质。Habio是一个完美的工具，可以帮助你一步步改善你的日常习惯。
localize.tagline: 你的习惯助手，建立新的习惯，改变生活。

localize.description: Habio讓你通過心理練習、基於CBT的反思日記和及時提醒調整生活方式目標，深入瞭解自己習慣的本質。Habio是一個完美的工具，可以幫助你一步步改善你的日常習慣。
localize.tagline: 你的習慣助手，建立新的習慣，改變生活。

previous.excerpt: Inspirational Tests is a free compilation of different A/B Tests conducted on the copy, CTA/Pricing page, and UX/Design of different landing pages.
previous.title: Inspirational A/B Tests - 30+ inspiring A/B test results and takeaways

localize.description: Inspirational Tests是一个免费的A/B测试汇编，其中包括对不同登陆页面的文案、CTA/价格页面和UX/设计进行的不同A/B测试。
localize.tagline: 30+个鼓舞人心的A/B测试结果和启示

localize.description: Inspirational Tests是一個免費的A/B測試彙編，其中包括對不同登陸頁面的文案、CTA/價格頁面和UX/設計進行的不同A/B測試。
localize.tagline: 30+個鼓舞人心的A/B測試結果和啓示
